pageProduct.name: Wanderlust Wander Force 60 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

With plant derived ingredients to relieve common cold symptoms and decrease symptom severity of mild upper respiratory tract infections.

Wanderlust Wander Force is a consciously created blend
of plant actives. Andrographis relieves common cold symptoms and decreases severity of mild upper respiratory tract infection symptoms. Willow Bark is traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to relieve mild fever. Echinacea is traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to
support immune health to fight illness. Acerola derived vitamin C supports healthy immune function and Olive Leaf provides antioxidant support.

Size: 60 Capsules

Warnings

Adults only. Not to be used in children under 5 years.

Andrographis may cause allergic reactions in some people. If you have a severe reaction (such as anaphylaxis) stop use and seek immediate medical attention.

Andrographis may cause taste disturbance including loss of taste. If you develop any adverse symptoms, stop use and seek medical advice.

If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional.

Ingredients

EACH CAPSULE CONTAINS:
Andrographis paniculata (Andrographis) herb top ext. dry conc. std. 90 mg
Derived from min. dry 1.35 g
Equiv. andrographolide (of Andrographis paniculata) 30 mg
Echinacea purpurea (Echinacea) whole plant ext. dry conc. 58.3 mg
Derived from dry 1.75 g
Malpighia glabra (Organic Acerola) fruit juice powder 46.9 mg
Equiv. ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 15 mg
Olea europaea (Olive) leaf ext. dry conc. 25 mg
Derived from dry 250 mg
Salix alba (White Willow) stem bark ext. dry conc. 96.8 mg
Derived from dry 1.5 g

No added gluten, dairy, lactose, soy, egg, artificial colours or
artificial flavours. Suitable for vegetarians and vegans.

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - ADULT DOSAGE:
Take one capsule, twice daily or as directed by your healthcare practitioner.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry
place. Do not use if cap seal or
inner seal is missing or broken.
